metadata.title: Sully Ruiz | Texas Real Estate Expert
metadata.description: Find your dream home in Texas or sell your property for top dollar. Expert real estate services with personalized attention.

hero.headline: Your Texas Real Estate Journey Starts Here
hero.subheadline: Whether buying your dream home or selling for maximum value, I'm here to guide you every step of the way.

about.title: Meet Sully Ruiz
about.subtitle: Your Texas Real Estate Expert
about.bio1: With a deep passion for Texas real estate and a commitment to excellence, I specialize in helping families find their dream homes and investors maximize their returns in the Austin area.
about.bio2: I believe in building lasting relationships based on trust, transparency, and results. Whether you're a first-time buyer or seasoned seller, I bring the same level of dedication and personalized attention to every transaction.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, streamlined process designed to make your real estate journey stress-free.

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We start with a conversation to understand your goals, timeline, and preferences.

step2.title: Personalized Strategy
step2.description: I create a customized plan tailored to your specific needs and market conditions.

step3.title: Expert Guidance
step3.description: From showings to negotiations, I handle every detail with your best interests in mind.

step4.title: Successful Closing
step4.description: Celebrate as we close the deal and hand you the keys to your new chapter.

services.title: How Can I Help You?
services.subtitle: Whether you're buying or selling, I provide comprehensive services to meet your needs.

buy.title: Buying a Home
buy.description: Find your perfect property with expert guidance through every step of the buying process.

sell.title: Selling Your Home
sell.description: Maximize your home's value with strategic marketing and expert pricing strategies.

leadMagnet.title: Free Home Buyer's Guide
leadMagnet.subtitle: Get your comprehensive guide to buying a home in Texas. Everything you need to know, from pre-approval to closing.

testimonials.title: What My Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from real people who found their perfect home.

testimonial1.quote: Sully got me $22,000 in grant money I didn't know existed! Used Texas First-Time Buyer program and city assistance. Now I own my dream home in Round Rock with only 3% down.
testimonial1.author: Maria Gonzalez

testimonial2.quote: Listed on Monday, had 3 offers by Friday, sold for $15K over asking! Marketing strategy brought qualified buyers immediately.
testimonial2.author: The Rodriguez Family

testimonial3.quote: House sat on market for 4 months with another agent. Sully repriced it and sold in 18 days!
testimonial3.author: Jennifer Smith

q1.question: How do I know if I'm ready to buy a home?
q1.answer: Ready to buy? Consider these factors: stable income, good credit score (typically 620+), savings for down payment (3-20%), and steady employment. I offer a free consultation to help you assess your readiness.

q2.question: What areas in Texas do you serve?
q2.answer: I primarily serve Austin, Round Rock, Cedar Park, Georgetown, Pflugerville, and Hutto. If you're looking in another Texas city, reach out - I have a network of trusted agents statewide.

q3.question: How long does the home buying process take?
q3.answer: The typical timeline is 30-45 days from accepted offer to closing. However, finding the right home can take longer depending on the market. I help streamline the process while ensuring you don't rush into the wrong decision.

q4.question: What are your fees?
q4.answer: For buyers, my services are typically free as the seller pays the commission. For sellers, we discuss commission structure during our consultation based on your property and needs.

q5.question: Do you speak Spanish?
q5.answer: Yes! Soy completamente bilingue. I'm fluent in both English and Spanish and happy to work in whichever language you prefer.

footer.tagline: Making Texas feel like home, one family at a time.
